ForumCode.AnswerClass_answer=Answer ForumCode.TopicClass_description=Description ## FLAG DIALOG conversations.flag.edit=Edit conversations.flag.button=Flag conversations.flag.viewsource=View Flag Source conversations.flag.dialog.header=Flag a Comment conversations.flag.dialog.guidingquestion1.txt=What happens when you flag a comment ? conversations.flag.dialog.instruction1.txt=You submit the comment thread for immediate evaluation by Forum Administrators. conversations.flag.dialog.guidingquestion2.txt=Why are you flagging this discussion? conversations.flag.dialog.required.field.icon=* conversations.flag.dialog.instruction2.txt=I am flagging this comment because it conversations.flag.dialog.instruction3.txt=Enter a note (no more than 300 characters) describing what makes this comment objectionable: conversations.flag.dialog.cancel.btt=Cancel conversations.flag.dialog.submit.btt=Submit ## REASONS FOR FLAGGING - USE IN FLAG DIALOG ForumCode.FlagClass_reason_=Select ForumCode.FlagClass_reason_1=promotes hate or violence ForumCode.FlagClass_reason_2=displays pornography ForumCode.FlagClass_reason_3=is empty or blank ForumCode.FlagClass_reason_4=is obviously commercial in nature, without clear educational relevance ForumCode.FlagClass_reason_5=is broken or has a virus ForumCode.FlagClass_reason_6=appears to be nonsensical ForumCode.FlagClass_reason_7=is objectionable for another reason ## FLAG SUCCESS MESSAGE conversations.flag.success.dialog.header=Discussion Flagged conversations.flag.success.dialog.message=You have successfully flagged this comment. conversations.flag.success.dialog.button=Close ## FLAG livetable conversations.flag.reason=Reason conversations.flag.user=User conversations.flag.doc.creationDate=Date conversations.flag.message=Message conversations.flag.moderator=Moderator conversations.flag.status=Status conversations.flag.target=Target conversations.flag.emptyvalue=- conversations.flag.list.title=Flag List conversations.flag.list.instructions=This is the list of flagged items conversations.flag.success.dialog.goback=Return to discussion conversations.addthis.title={0} #xwikiforum conversations.addthis.desc={0} ## most active discussions discussion.panel.title=Discussion Topics discussion.panel.sortby=Sort By: discussion.panel.dates=Dates discussion.panel.votes=Votes discussion.panel.comments=Comments discussion.panel.topics=Topics## ## rights conversation.groups.norights=You must be a member of this group to participate to this discussion.
